com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui

Class GuiWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.AbstractNode
      • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiContainer
        • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventListener<GuiButton,java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Integer>

    public class GuiWindow
extends GuiContainer
implements IEventListener<GuiButton,java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Integer>
    This GUI node is a embedded draggable window that can contain other nodes.
    Author:
    Maxstupo

        Parameters:
        screen - the screen that owns this node.
        title - the title of the window.
        localX - the local x position.
        localY - the local y position.
        width - the width of this node.
        height - the height of this node.
